T02TD1661E:1b-1: shr'i sarba buddha sa ma yo ga tantra n'a ma panytsi k'a /
T02TD1661E:1b-3: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel /
T02TD1661E:1b-4: bcom ldan [dd] 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1661E:1b-5: kun mkhyen kun mdzad thams cad pa //
T02TD1661E:1b-6: kun khyab mchod chen rdo rje dang //
T02TD1661E:1b-7: slob dpon aindra bh'u ti la //
T02TD1661E:1b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa'i tshig / bla mas bstan par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:1b-10: gsang ba zhes ni gang la bgyi //
T02TD1661E:1b-11: mchog gi zhes ni gang la bgyi //
T02TD1661E:1b-12: dgyes pa zhes ni ji ltar bshad //
T02TD1661E:1b-13: thams cad bdag nyid ji ltar bzhugs //
T02TD1661E:1b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po gang //
T02TD1661E:1b-15: sems dpa' zhes ni gang la bgyi //
T02TD1661E:1b-16: rnam pa dag ni gang dag gis //
T02TD1661E:1b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / bde ba rnam pa du ru bshad //
T02TD1661E:1b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:1b-19: de ni ji ltar rang byung yin //
T02TD1661E:1b-20: gcig pu nyid ni ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:1b-21: bcom ldan 'das sgra ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:1b-22: che ba'i lha ni ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:1b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad don gang lags //
T02TD1661E:2a-2: mkha' 'gro zhes bya gang gi ming //
T02TD1661E:2a-3: sgyu ma ji ltar 'gyur ba lags //
T02TD1661E:2a-4: bde ba'i mchog ces gang la bgyi //
T02TD1661E:2a-5: de bzhin ngan par spyod pa gang //
T02TD1661E:2a-6: khyed kyi chags pa med pa gang //
T02TD1661E:2a-7: chags pa yang ni gang zhig lags //
T02TD1661E:2a-8: chags bral min pa'ang khyed kyis shod //
T02TD1661E:2a-9: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma ci //
T02TD1661E:2a-10: rgya 'di gnyis med theg pa yi //
T02TD1661E:2a-11: mchog ces gang la rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1661E:2a-12: gnas ni gang du yang dag bshad //
T02TD1661E:2a-15: der ni 'khor yang ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:2a-16: rigs ni dbye ba du ru bshad //
T02TD1661E:2a-17: sngags btu ba yi rim pa gang //
T02TD1661E:2a-18: stong pa'i klu zhes gang la bshad //
T02TD1661E:2a-19: brjod dang 'brel dang dgos pa dang //
T02TD1661E:2a-20: sngon byung ba yi rnam drug dang ;
T02TD1661E:2a-21: / de bzhin sna tshogs padma ras //
T02TD1661E:2a-22: a'a li k'a li mnyam pa'i rgya //
T02TD1661E:2a-23: mnyam med mi g-yo bstod pa dang //
T02TD1661E:2a-24: de nyid min pa'i rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD1661E:2a-25: shin tu de nyid ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:2a-26: rol mo phyag rgya'ang bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:2a-27: mnyam par ma gzhag rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD1661E:2a-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dag / shar bdag ni ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:2a-29: dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD1661E:2a-30: rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin //
T02TD1661E:2b-0: rin chen mchog gi @2b rin chen dbyibs //
T02TD1661E:2b-1: bri ba 'am yang na mi bri ba'i //
T02TD1661E:2b-2: dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar gzhag / dkyil 'khor dang ni rgyud dang ni //
T02TD1661E:2b-3: de bzhin du ni sngags rnams kyis //
T02TD1661E:2b-4: sbas dang gtso bo'i sgra ni gang //
T02TD1661E:2b-5: cho ga rnams kyang bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:2b-6: sbyor ba'i rnam pa'ang ji lta bus //
T02TD1661E:2b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' stobs chen yin //
T02TD1661E:2b-8: dbang phyug dang ni tshangs pa dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-9: dbang por bcas dang khyab 'jug dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-10: 'dod lha chung mar bcas gsol zhing //
T02TD1661E:2b-11: lha mo bhi ma drug min bcas //
T02TD1661E:2b-12: mngon thon sbyar bas spyad mdzad la //
T02TD1661E:2b-13: sngon ni de la skyabs su song //
T02TD1661E:2b-15: der ni gsang ba ji lta bur //
T02TD1661E:2b-16: rdo rje can de brdzun pa'i tshig / phyi nas gsung bar mdzad gyur te //
T02TD1661E:2b-17: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-18: tshangs pa khyab 'jug zla ba dang /
T02TD1661E:2b-19: thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs zhes //
T02TD1661E:2b-20: gzhan yang sngon ni gsungs pa nyid //
T02TD1661E:2b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' byed pa po //
T02TD1661E:2b-22: lha gzhan gang zhig yod dam ci //
T02TD1661E:2b-23: rdo rje nyi ma mnan pa dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-24: rnam par snang mdzad dpal nyid dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-25: dpal ldan rdo rje mchog mnan cing //
T02TD1661E:2b-26: de bzhin du yang rta mchog dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-27: 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul mo dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-28: byang chub de bzhin pha rol phyin //
T02TD1661E:2b-29: rkang pa rkyong dang gnon pa dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-30: bskums nas 'degs pa'i stabs dag gis //
T02TD1661E:2b-31: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1661E:2b-32: gzugs rnams thams cad gnon par byed //
T02TD1661E:2b-33: bcom ldan lha yi rnal 'byor ni //
T02TD1661E:2b-34: mngon sum rjes su dpag pa gang //
T02TD1661E:2b-35: d'a ni nam mkhar 'gro sgra dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-36: thams cad ma lus pa nyid dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-37: kun tu kun nas thams cad ni //
T02TD1661E:2b-38: bdag nyid kun tu rnam pa kun //
T02TD1661E:2b-39: sangs rgyas brtan g-yol sogs kun //
T02TD1661E:2b-40: kun gyi dngos por ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:2b-41: ji ltar sems de 'di ltar yang //
T02TD1661E:2b-42: dngos po kun la gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:2b-43: rdo rje can gyi gzhi nyid dang //
T02TD1661E:2b-44: khro bo'i gzugs su ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:2b-45: chos kyi sku ni ji ltar bshad //
T02TD1661E:2b-46: longs spyod rdzogs pas gang zhig bya //
T02TD1661E:2b-47: sprul pa'i tshig ni ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:2b-48: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig ni gang //
T02TD1661E:2b-49: lha yi tshig ni gang zhig ces //
T02TD1661E:2b-50: sh'akya'i bshes gnyen the tshom gyur //
T02TD1661E:2b-51: sngags ston rnams kyis btus pa yis //
T02TD1661E:2b-52: bcos pa'i tshig ni gang zhig lha //
T02TD1661E:3a-2: 'di dag thams cad bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:3a-3: de nas legs so legs so zhes //
T02TD1661E:3a-4: slob dpon aindra bh'u tis byin //
T02TD1661E:3a-5: sh'akya shes rab rab ldan khyod //
T02TD1661E:3a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa nyon //
T02TD1661E:3a-7: ji ltar bla mas bdag la bshad //
T02TD1661E:3a-8: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1661E:3a-9: gnas ni nam mkha' lngas brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1661E:3a-10: shes rab bha ga yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:3a-11: chos kyi 'khor lo lte ba cher //
T02TD1661E:3a-12: rdo rje can ni stong bar bzhugs //
T02TD1661E:3a-13: nyid kyi thugs ni bdag nyid can //
T02TD1661E:3a-14: bde mchog de yi zhu ba po //
T02TD1661E:3a-15: rdo rje can gyis bdag 'dod spyod //
T02TD1661E:3a-16: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur mdzad cing //
T02TD1661E:3a-17: sprul pa'i sku ni stong pa dang //
T02TD1661E:3a-18: chos kyi sku ni thig ler bcas //
T02TD1661E:3a-19: ji ltar yang dag rdzogs gyur cing //
T02TD1661E:3a-20: ston pa gdan la legs bzhugs te //
T02TD1661E:3a-21: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur mdzad nas //
T02TD1661E:3a-22: sangs rgyas kun sbyor bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:3a-23: bde mchog ma mo'i tshogs bcas par //
T02TD1661E:3a-24: 'dir ni zhu ba por gyur to //
T02TD1661E:3a-25: rdo rje can gyi ma ma la //
T02TD1661E:3a-26: rigs kyi dbye bas phyi ste bshad //
T02TD1661E:3a-28: dgos pa sgrub pa po rnams kyis //
T02TD1661E:3a-29: sbas pa'i sgra ni gsang ba ste //
T02TD1661E:3a-30: rdo rje can gyi sba bar bshad //
T02TD1661E:3a-31: gtso bo'i sgra ni 'di ni bshad //
T02TD1661E:3a-32: mngon sum gyi ni tshig nyid do //
T02TD1661E:3a-33: gang tshe sems ni mi mthong bas //
T02TD1661E:3a-34: sbas te rjes su dpag pa ste //
T02TD1661E:3a-35: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1661E:3a-36: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1661E:3a-37: gzugs sogs sngo dang ser po dang //
T02TD1661E:3a-38: dkar dang le brgan mdog tu ni //
T02TD1661E:3a-39: gang tshe sems ni mi mthong zhing //
T02TD1661E:3a-40: rna bdag gis mi thos pas //
T02TD1661E:3a-41: gang tshe sems ni ji 'dra zhes //
T02TD1661E:3a-42: rjes su dpag par de tshe 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:3a-43: gzhan yang dri bcas sna dang ni //
T02TD1661E:3a-44: lce yis tshor bar mi 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1661E:3a-45: de bzhin longs spyod bde ba bdag / gzhan gyi sems mthong mi 'gyur la //
T02TD1661E:3a-46: kha dang ra yis ma yin zhing //
T02TD1661E:3a-47: reg bya rnams kyang de bzhin te //
T02TD1661E:3a-48: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1661E:3a-49: gang zhig thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs //
T02TD1661E:3a-50: rjes su dpag pas sgom byed pa //
T02TD1661E:3a-51: gsang ba'i gzhung ni 'di lta bu'o //
T02TD1661E:3a-52: 'di ni zhes bya'i sgra yod pas //
T02TD1661E:3a-53: la la mngon sum par 'dod te //
T02TD1661E:3a-54: rang byung kun du snang gyur cing /
T02TD1661E:3b-0: @3b de bzhin longs spyod rdzogs sku dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-1: mi ru snang zhing spyod pa dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-2: snom zhing myang dad bzhad pa dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-3: rnam pa sna tshogs g-yul 'gyed dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-4: dbang po gnyis kyis 'dod bde dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-5: phyag ni brgya phrag bye ba dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-6: dbu ni 'bum khrag khrir gyur cing //
T02TD1661E:3b-7: tshad med zhabs gnyis zhabs bzhi dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' brtan pa dang //
T02TD1661E:3b-9: g-yo ba rnams ni khyab pa zhes //
T02TD1661E:3b-10: gang phyir sngar bzhin bshad pas na //
T02TD1661E:3b-11: rtag tu mngon sum snang ba yis //
T02TD1661E:3b-12: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa yi //
T02TD1661E:3b-13: mngon sum gzhung ni 'di lta bu //
T02TD1661E:3b-14: de nas sh'akya'i bshes gnyen gyis //
T02TD1661E:3b-15: aindra bh'u ti la zhus pa //
T02TD1661E:3b-16: gsang ba zhes ni bshad pa de //
T02TD1661E:3b-17: gang gis mi la rab tu bshad //
T02TD1661E:3b-18: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:3b-19: de nyid gsang ba zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1661E:3b-20: sa bon lnga ni gsang ba ste //
T02TD1661E:3b-21: sbas pa'i bden pa bshad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:3b-23: karna ka yi dga' gsang ba //
T02TD1661E:3b-24: thams cad 'dus pa gsang ba ste //
T02TD1661E:3b-25: bde ba'i 'og ni gsang ba zhes //
T02TD1661E:3b-26: brda yis bshad par mdzad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:3b-27: byang chub sems las byung ba yi //
T02TD1661E:3b-28: ting nge 'dzin ni mchog ces bshad //
T02TD1661E:3b-29: sems kyi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1661E:3b-30: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba bzhin //
T02TD1661E:3b-31: bde mchog ces ni bya bar bsgrags //
T02TD1661E:3b-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gang //
T02TD1661E:3b-33: de ni gcig las du mar phye //
T02TD1661E:3b-34: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'ang de //
T02TD1661E:3b-35: kun mkhyen kun rtsol phra ba ste //
T02TD1661E:3b-36: snying ga'i phug gi nang na gnas //
T02TD1661E:3b-37: de ni sgyu ma'i gzugs su shes //
T02TD1661E:3b-38: sangs rgyas thams cad ston pa te //
T02TD1661E:3b-39: sngon byung ba ni rnam lnga nyid //
T02TD1661E:3b-40: bde mchog la ni yang dag bshad //
T02TD1661E:3b-41: drug pa nyid kyang 'bum sde yi //
T02TD1661E:3b-42: tshad kun rgyud kyi nang yin de //
T02TD1661E:3b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' de la bshad //
T02TD1661E:3b-44: mi yi 'jig rten dag na med //
T02TD1661E:3b-45: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:3b-46: sngon byung go ri mas ji lta ba //
T02TD1661E:3b-47: 'di ni bden pa mchog gi tshig / skad cig tsam gyis gyis dus gcig na //
T02TD1661E:3b-48: sngon byung ba dang gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1661E:3b-49: sngon byung ba dang bde mchog gi //
T02TD1661E:3b-50: dus mang ngag du ma bshad de //
T02TD1661E:3b-51: bla ma rdo rje can bshad pa //
T02TD1661E:3b-52: ma mo rnams kyi nang du bshad //
T02TD1661E:4a-2: shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1661E:4a-3: de tshe rtag tu rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:4a-4: sangs rgyas skur ni 'dzin mdzad nas //
T02TD1661E:4a-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis //
T02TD1661E:4a-6: khengs las sems can kun grol mdzad //
T02TD1661E:4a-7: sangs rgyas srid la legs bzhag nas //
T02TD1661E:4a-8: dbugs 'byin pa ni stsol bar mdzad //
T02TD1661E:4a-9: rnam par snang mdzad dbugs 'byin bshad //
T02TD1661E:4a-10: he ru ka'i yang de nyon cig / de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1661E:4a-11: shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur //
T02TD1661E:4a-12: lha la sogs pa 'jigs byed cing //
T02TD1661E:4a-13: bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed //
T02TD1661E:4a-14: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can ;
T02TD1661E:4a-15: / khro bo'i gzugs su rnam par phyung //
T02TD1661E:4a-16: 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar gtum //
T02TD1661E:4a-17: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD1661E:4a-18: thams cad za zhing dral ba dang //
T02TD1661E:4a-19: thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed //
T02TD1661E:4a-20: he ru ka yi dbugs 'byung ba'ang //
T02TD1661E:4a-21: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi'am//
T02TD1661E:4a-22: rdo rje nyi ma rta mgrin te //
T02TD1661E:4a-23: thams cad rdo rje can las phyung //
T02TD1661E:4a-24: 'di ni gtam gyi phyag rgya las //
T02TD1661E:4a-25: 'di nyid dang po bstan pa yin //
T02TD1661E:4a-26: sdud par byed pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:4a-27: tshang pa khyab 'jug dbang por bcas //
T02TD1661E:4a-28: lha chen po dang 'dod lha dag / rdo rje can gyi zhabs dag la //
T02TD1661E:4a-29: dad pas skyabs su 'ongs gyur pa //
T02TD1661E:4a-30: ci yi phyir na nge yis gsol //
T02TD1661E:4a-31: bi ma la sogs mngon thon spyad //
T02TD1661E:4a-32: bdag gis sngar ni gsol mod kyi //
T02TD1661E:4a-33: 'di la the tshom gyur pa mchis //
T02TD1661E:4a-34: slob dpon gyis de skad ces smras so //
T02TD1661E:4a-35: khyab 'jug sgra ni rnam shes yin //
T02TD1661E:4a-36: tshangs pa sa bon yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:4a-37: dbang po lus su gyur pa yin //
T02TD1661E:4a-38: bde ba thams cad 'dod pa'i lha //
T02TD1661E:4a-39: lha chen po ni sems de nyid //
T02TD1661E:4a-40: gzugs med khams la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1661E:4a-41: bi ma la sogs ming gis ni //
T02TD1661E:4a-42: shes rab kyi ni bha gar bshad //
T02TD1661E:4a-43: nang gi gzhur ni 'di yin la //
T02TD1661E:4a-44: phyi yi gzhan du bshad pa ste ;
T02TD1661E:4a-45: / rdo rje sems dpas tshangs la sogs //
T02TD1661E:4a-46: mu stegs rnams ni mngon mnan pa //
T02TD1661E:4a-47: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1661E:4a-48: rab tu 'dud par mi byed pas //
T02TD1661E:4a-49: dgos pa de yi don du ni //
T02TD1661E:4a-50: zhabs g-yon gyis ni drag po mnan //
T02TD1661E:4a-51: rdo rje can gyi brdzun tshig ni //
T02TD1661E:4b-0: gang zhig khyod @4b kyis sngon dris pa //
T02TD1661E:4b-1: gang cho lha chen mnan gyur na //
T02TD1661E:4b-2: thams cad khyab par ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:4b-3: rdo rje sems dpas 'gro ba kun //
T02TD1661E:4b-4: sna tshogs gzugs su rnam sprul te //
T02TD1661E:4b-5: gti mug zhe sdang chags pa ni //
T02TD1661E:4b-6: tshangs dang khyab 'jug lha chen gyur //
T02TD1661E:4b-7: rdo rje can gyis bka' ma stsal //
T02TD1661E:4b-8: lha chen mo yang stong pa yin //
T02TD1661E:4b-9: bstan pa thams cad gnon par mdzad //
T02TD1661E:4b-10: ma ni mi dang lha ma yin //
T02TD1661E:4b-11: ha ni bzhir gyur pa nyid de //
T02TD1661E:4b-12: gti mug zhe sdang chags pa ni //
T02TD1661E:4b-13: de ni lus kyi dbugs gnas pa //
T02TD1661E:4b-14: bi ni rlung gi gzugs can no //
T02TD1661E:4b-15: de nyid tshangs pa'i sgra can te //
T02TD1661E:4b-16: khyab 'jug dang ni dbang po'ang yin //
T02TD1661E:4b-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying gnas pa'i //
T02TD1661E:4b-18: bud med rtag par 'dod chags spyad //
T02TD1661E:4b-19: de bas brtan dang g-yo bcas la //
T02TD1661E:4b-20: spyod pas 'dod pa'i lhar gyur to //
T02TD1661E:4b-21: thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs nyid la //
T02TD1661E:4b-23: sdud par byed pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:4b-24: padma gsang ba zhes bshad cing //
T02TD1661E:4b-25: gsang ba 'dod par bshad pa dang //
T02TD1661E:4b-26: gsang ba sa bon zhes bshad cing //
T02TD1661E:4b-27: gsang ba mtshal chen zhes bshad do //
T02TD1661E:4b-28: gsang ba rnal 'byor pa yi rdzas //
T02TD1661E:4b-29: dri chu sha ste lnga po yi //
T02TD1661E:4b-30: mchog ni bdud rtsi rdzas rnams te //
T02TD1661E:4b-31: g-yo ba yi ni khams rnams kun //

T02TD1661E:5b-13: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //

T02TD1661E:5b-23: 'brel bas sa bon mtshal chen po //

T02TD1661E:5b-25: sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1661E:5b-26: sngags kyi gzugs kyis zos pas ni //
T02TD1661E:5b-28: shar ba zhes bya'i sgra gang yin //

T02TD1661E:5b-50: sdud par byed pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:5b-51: d'a ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes//
T02TD1661E:6a-0: @6a * // khams las mngon du rtag pa ste //
T02TD1661E:6a-1: nam mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pas //

T02TD1661E:6a-4: don ni ji ltar nye bar sbyar //
T02TD1661E:6a-5: de nas sgra 'di brtag bya ste //

T02TD1661E:6a-7: slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung dag gis //
T02TD1661E:6a-8: 'di ni sbyor ba bshad par bya //
T02TD1661E:6a-9: khams kyi sgra ni sa bon te //
T02TD1661E:6a-10: gcig tu brtag pa nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1661E:6a-11: bza' ba brtag pa de bzhin te //
T02TD1661E:6a-12: d'a ni mkha' 'gro'i sgra yis so //
T02TD1661E:6a-13: aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung nyon cig /de ni lus zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:6a-14: be ni rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1661E:6a-15: ha ni gzhi ru gyur pa ste //
T02TD1661E:6a-16: rkang pa'i gzhi nas spyi bor brten //

T02TD1661E:6a-18: rtag tu rang nyid brjod pa yin //

T02TD1661E:6a-24: gsang ba'i yi ge bcu drug ste //

T02TD1661E:6a-26: ha ni de bzhin reg pa'o //

T02TD1661E:6a-29: ra ni chu yi ngo bo'o //

T02TD1661E:6a-31: ra ni me nyid yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:6a-32: me ni de bzhin sha nyid do //
T02TD1661E:6a-33: sa ni bshang bar bshad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:6a-34: rba ni de bzhin zhag yin la //
T02TD1661E:6a-35: ma ni pags pa nyid du bshad //

T02TD1661E:6a-43: khams kyi sgra ni 'di dag tu //
T02TD1661E:6a-44: aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung yin no //

T02TD1661E:6b-0: @6b gzhung 'di slob dpon gang gis lags //

T02TD1661E:6b-14: dkyil 'khor gru gsum bri ba ni //
T02TD1661E:6b-15: rta mgrin gyi ni dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1661E:6b-16: rin chen dbyibs su bya ba ni //
T02TD1661E:6b-17: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du'o //

T02TD1661E:6b-23: sngags kyi 'byung ba gsang ba dang //

T02TD1661E:6b-36: sngags kyi 'byung ba gsang ba ni //

T02TD1661E:7a-26: chags dang bral min rdo rje cu //

T02TD1661E:10a-52: rol mo mang po rtag par ni //

T02TD1661E:10b-0: padma thal mo'i sgra yang @10b yin ;
T02TD1661E:10b-1: / rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung nyon cig / rkan sogs mgo nas rkang pa'i bar //
T02TD1661E:10b-2: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1661E:10b-3: rdo rje can ni thal mo ste //
T02TD1661E:10b-4: padma'i sgras ni bde mchog go //
T02TD1661E:10b-5: de dag phyag rgya rab sbyor ba //
T02TD1661E:10b-6: padma thal mo de bshad pa //
T02TD1661E:10b-7: rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te //
T02TD1661E:10b-8: de bzhin aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung //
T02TD1661E:10b-9: padma thal mo'i bdag nyid che //
T02TD1661E:10b-10: sh'a kya bshes gnyen 'di nyon cig / padma'i sgra yis padma ni //
T02TD1661E:10b-11: dkyil 'khor lngar ldan yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:10b-12: de ni gnyid log shes min zhing //
T02TD1661E:10b-13: lus med dbang po rnams dang bral //
T02TD1661E:10b-14: bri ba nyid kyis de bskul zhing //
T02TD1661E:10b-15: thal mo de gsum gsum yin no //
T02TD1661E:10b-16: de nas rdo rje can bskul nas //
T02TD1661E:10b-17: mngal 'dzin pa ni legs par bshad //
T02TD1661E:10b-18: he ru ka dpal dang 'drar bshad //
T02TD1661E:10b-19: don mang pha rol gnon sbas pa'o //
T02TD1661E:10b-20: shr'i ni dang por yang dag ldan //
T02TD1661E:10b-21: h'um bhyo'i sngags ni btu bar bya //
T02TD1661E:10b-23: slob dpon bo shata smra bar byed //
T02TD1661E:10b-24: yi ge gsum gyi dngos bzlas pa'i //
T02TD1661E:10b-25: cang te'u mtshan mo rdud byed na //
T02TD1661E:10b-26: ji snyed thos pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams //
T02TD1661E:10b-27: phyogs bcu rnams su sgra yang sgrogs //
T02TD1661E:10b-28: sgra ni stong par mi byed cing //
T02TD1661E:10b-29: ma mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gnon //
T02TD1661E:10b-30: gal te rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi //
T02TD1661E:10b-32: kha tr'am ga ni g-yon pas blang //
T02TD1661E:10b-33: mtshal can gyis bkang thod pa thogs //
T02TD1661E:10b-34: mi yi rgyu mas lus dkris te //
T02TD1661E:10b-35: rig pa dag ni sgrub pa yi //
T02TD1661E:10b-36: sha chen dag tu phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1661E:10b-37: thal bas lus la bsgos pa dang //
T02TD1661E:10b-38: sha yis bkang pa'i thod pa ni //
T02TD1661E:10b-39: phyag rgya'i lag pas sbyin par bye //
T02TD1661E:10b-40: smin ma la sogs bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1661E:10b-41: bha ga'i padma mchod par bya //
T02TD1661E:10b-42: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor du sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1661E:10b-43: der na yi ge phat bsgrags bya //
T02TD1661E:10b-44: shing gcig drung ngam dur khrod dam //
T02TD1661E:10b-45: chung ngogs dag gam bzhi mdo ru //
T02TD1661E:10b-46: zla ba mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la //
T02TD1661E:10b-47: rgyal dang lhan cig brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1661E:10b-48: brtson 'grus brtan pas bgrod pa yis //
T02TD1661E:10b-49: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub //
T02TD1661E:11a-1: de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal zhing //
T02TD1661E:11a-2: yid la gang dag 'dod pa yi //
T02TD1661E:11a-3: nam mkhar spyod pa'i dngos grub ster //
T02TD1661E:11a-4: dngos grub kyi ni sbyor ba 'dis //
T02TD1661E:11a-5: slob dpon ku ku ras bsgrub pa //
T02TD1661E:11a-6: sh'akya'i bshes gnyen khyod la bshad //
T02TD1661E:11a-7: gzhan gyis slob ma gzhan la min //
T02TD1661E:11a-8: he ru ka yi rol mo gsang //
T02TD1661E:11a-9: sbyor ba dag gis bshad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:11a-10: gzhung 'di ji ltar smra ba ni //
T02TD1661E:11a-11: slob dpon aindra bh'u ti yin //
T02TD1661E:11a-12: slob dpon rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung //
T02TD1661E:11a-13: yi ge shr'i ni rig par bshad //
T02TD1661E:11a-14: he ni sa bon yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:11a-15: ru ni mtshal chen nyid yin zhing //
T02TD1661E:11a-16: ka ni sku yi rdo rje'o //
T02TD1661E:11a-17: khrag 'thung rol mo bshad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:11a-18: sh'akya'i bshes gnyen gyis zhus pa //
T02TD1661E:11a-19: rgyal po'i rol mo rol mo gzhan //
T02TD1661E:11a-20: shin tu myur ba bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:11a-21: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:11a-22: rgyal po'i rol mo'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1661E:11a-23: rtag par rgyun du brdung bar ni //
T02TD1661E:11a-24: la la rol mo nyid du 'dod //
T02TD1661E:11a-25: la la sngags ni yin par smra //
T02TD1661E:11a-27: rab bzhang [*bzhad?] rdo rje'i gzhan yin te //
T02TD1661E:11a-28: r'a ni mtshal chen yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:11a-29: dza ni rkang pa'i nang gnas pa //
T02TD1661E:11a-30: ba ni mtshan dag yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:11a-31: tye ni lus su gyur pa yin //
T02TD1661E:11a-32: rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te //
T02TD1661E:11a-33: aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung nyon cig / r'a ni gzi brjid yin par smra //
T02TD1661E:11a-34: steng gi sgo na rnam par gnas //
T02TD1661E:11a-35: dza ni gang du skye ba ste //
T02TD1661E:11a-36: chos kyi lte ba bha ga'i nang //
T02TD1661E:11a-37: ba ni khams kyi gzugs can te //
T02TD1661E:11a-38: spu'i rtse mo brgyar gyur pa'i cha //
T02TD1661E:11a-39: tye ni snying gi padma ru //
T02TD1661E:11a-40: byang chub sems ni rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:11a-41: dbang po kun las rnam 'das shing //
T02TD1661E:11a-42: dbang po thams cad yongs sbangs pa'o //
T02TD1661E:11a-43: dbang po thams cad 'dzin rgyal po //
T02TD1661E:11a-44: rgyal po'i rol mor de 'gyur ro //
T02TD1661E:11a-45: sa dang chu dang me la sogs //
T02TD1661E:11a-46: 'byung ba kun gyis rgyal po yin //
T02TD1661E:11a-48: sh'akya'i bshes gnyen la bshad pa'o //
T02TD1661E:11a-49: shin tu myur ba ji bzhin smra //
T02TD1661E:11a-50: gzhan yang bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1661E:11b-0: aa ni sngags su gyur pa @11b yin //
T02TD1661E:11b-2: dh'u ni mtshal chen yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:11b-3: ta ni sa bon nyid yin pa //
T02TD1661E:11b-4: rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te //
T02TD1661E:11b-5: aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung nyon cig / aa zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'dis //
T02TD1661E:11b-6: bde mchog sgron ma la sogs pa //
T02TD1661E:11b-7: ti ni dngos po gsum spangs te ;
T02TD1661E:11b-8: / sku gsung thugs la reg pa la //
T02TD1661E:11b-9: dha ni nges pa thams cad ste //
T02TD1661E:11b-10: ta ni mi zad de nyid yin //
T02TD1661E:11b-11: gzugs med gyur pa'i bde ba ni //
T02TD1661E:11b-12: reg pa'i bde ba tshor ba'o //
T02TD1661E:11b-13: yod dang med pa ma yin dang //
T02TD1661E:11b-14: khams gsum thams cad bdag yin zhing //
T02TD1661E:11b-15: myur bar zhu bar gyur pa yin //
T02TD1661E:11b-16: byang chub sems su rnam par 'phrul //
T02TD1661E:11b-17: shin tu myur ba'i sgrar grags pa //
T02TD1661E:11b-18: bdag gis phye ste bshad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:11b-20: shin tu myur ba mi rtag pa'o //
T02TD1661E:11b-21: sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:11b-22: slob dpon aindra bh'u ti lha //
T02TD1661E:11b-23: bdag ni slar yang zhu bar 'tshal //
T02TD1661E:11b-24: slob dpon rab bzhad rdo rje dang //
T02TD1661E:11b-25: slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung rnams kyi //
T02TD1661E:11b-26: rol mo'i don rnams mang po dang //
T02TD1661E:11b-27: a'a li k'a li sngags bcas dang //
T02TD1661E:11b-28: gsang ba'i gzhung gi don mang dang //
T02TD1661E:11b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga'i rim //
T02TD1661E:11b-30: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dang //
T02TD1661E:11b-31: d'a ni nam mkha' 'gro ba'i sgra //
T02TD1661E:11b-32: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1661E:11b-33: mkha' 'gro sgyur ma bde ba'i mchog / lha yi ji bzhin bka' stsal cing //
T02TD1661E:11b-34: sngags rnams kyang ni gsal bar mdzad //
T02TD1661E:11b-35: de nas sh'kya'i bshes gnyen la //
T02TD1661E:11b-36: slob dpon gyis ni legs zhes gnang //
T02TD1661E:11b-38: stan ni yongs su spangs nas kyang //
T02TD1661E:11b-39: bus mo sa la bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1661E:11b-40: bdag nyid yongs su phul bar gyur //
T02TD1661E:11b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02TD1661E:11b-42: gnas ni gang du bzhugs gyur pa //
T02TD1661E:11b-43: brtan g-yo kun la rol mdzad pa //
T02TD1661E:11b-44: bcom ldan lha yis bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:11b-45: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:11b-46: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ba //
T02TD1661E:11b-47: sh'akya tshul bzhin mnyan par gyis //
T02TD1661E:11b-48: thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par //
T02TD1661E:11b-49: gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid //
T02TD1661E:12a-2: de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:12a-3: de la lte ba'i 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1661E:12a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad //
T02TD1661E:12a-5: rdo rje can ni der bzhugs pa //
T02TD1661E:12a-6: cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1661E:12a-7: lus can rnams kyi nang na rol //
T02TD1661E:12a-8: lus las 'das shing gos pa med //
T02TD1661E:12a-9: la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1661E:12a-10: la lar snang dang kha dag dang /
T02TD1661E:12a-11: la lar rna ba sgra dag dang //
T02TD1661E:12a-12: la lar dri chen rdo rje chu //
T02TD1661E:12a-13: la lar tshor dang bcas pa'i sems //
T02TD1661E:12a-14: la lar skom dang la lar bkres //
T02TD1661E:12a-15: la lar khro dang la lar zhi //
T02TD1661E:12a-16: la lar bde la rnam par gzigs //
T02TD1661E:12a-17: la lar bud med 'dod chags de //
T02TD1661E:12a-18: la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste //
T02TD1661E:12a-19: la lar rol mo brdung bar mdzad //
T02TD1661E:12a-20: la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas //
T02TD1661E:12a-21: la lar rol zhing spyod par 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:12a-22: la lar srod tu rnam par gnas //
T02TD1661E:12a-23: la lar sa dang chu dang me ;
T02TD1661E:12a-24: / la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga //
T02TD1661E:12a-25: la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD1661E:12a-26: bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag / la lar ma dang sring mor ru //
T02TD1661E:12a-27: la lar chung ma bu mo ru //
T02TD1661E:12a-28: la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang //
T02TD1661E:12a-29: khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid //
T02TD1661E:12a-30: la lar zla ba skar mas bcas //
T02TD1661E:12a-31: la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur //
T02TD1661E:12a-32: la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun //
T02TD1661E:12a-33: byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal //
T02TD1661E:12a-34: la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu bar //
T02TD1661E:12a-35: la lar shi ba'i dbang gis zhum //
T02TD1661E:12a-36: mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:12a-37: la lar byang chub chen por gshegs //
T02TD1661E:12a-38: la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal //
T02TD1661E:12a-39: la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1661E:12a-41: la lar nad chen gyis zin pa //
T02TD1661E:12a-42: la lar sngo dang le brgan dang //
T02TD1661E:12a-43: la lar dkar dang ser ba'o //
T02TD1661E:12a-44: la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1661E:12a-45: la lar sgron ma gos dkar mo //
T02TD1661E:12a-46: la lar spyan dang m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1661E:12a-47: la lar dka' zlog zhi ba mo //
T02TD1661E:12a-48: la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang //
T02TD1661E:12a-49: nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid //
T02TD1661E:12a-50: la lar klu dang sbrul chen po //
T02TD1661E:12a-51: la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni //
T02TD1661E:12a-52: la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang //
T02TD1661E:12a-53: la lar gnyid ni log pas gnas //
T02TD1661E:12b-0: @12b la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang //
T02TD1661E:12b-1: la lar khrag dang pa gas par 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:12b-2: la lar mya ngan du ba dang //
T02TD1661E:12b-3: la lar bsreg pa'i mi dag yin //
T02TD1661E:12b-4: la lar mtho ris skye ba ste //
T02TD1661E:12b-6: thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la //
T02TD1661E:12b-7: aindra bh'u ti'i bshad pa yin ;
T02TD1661E:12b-8: / lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i //
T02TD1661E:12b-9: de yi sgyu ma sna tshogs 'di //
T02TD1661E:12b-10: rtag pa min pa rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:12b-11: gzugs med par ni bha ga'i nang //
T02TD1661E:12b-12: lte ba'i nang na padma che //
T02TD1661E:12b-13: bcu drug thig gis thig btab par //
T02TD1661E:12b-14: yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1661E:12b-15: bskor ba'i bya ba byas pa yin //
T02TD1661E:12b-16: de dbus rtag tu gsang ba ni //
T02TD1661E:12b-18: de ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:12b-19: gcig pu rang 'byung che ba'i lha //
T02TD1661E:12b-20: de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes //
T02TD1661E:12b-21: mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:12b-22: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa la //
T02TD1661E:12b-23: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1661E:12b-24: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am //
T02TD1661E:12b-25: yang na mi shigs kun mkhyen pa //
T02TD1661E:12b-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos por ni //
T02TD1661E:12b-27: la lar lha mo'i tshogs la 'dod //
T02TD1661E:12b-28: bcom ldan lha yi rnal 'byor ni //
T02TD1661E:12b-29: sngags dang phyag rgya bsdus pa yin //
T02TD1661E:12b-30: bsam gtan dag ni ji ltar bgyi //
T02TD1661E:12b-31: lha ni ji ltar bskyed par bgyi ;
T02TD1661E:12b-32: / dkyil 'khor gnas ni gang dag tu //
T02TD1661E:12b-33: lha rnams rnal 'byor bsgom pa rnams //
T02TD1661E:12b-34: gtso bo 'di dag the tshom gyur //
T02TD1661E:12b-35: de dag thams cad bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:12b-36: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:12b-37: lung dang bstan bcos shes pa dang //
T02TD1661E:12b-38: snyan dngags byed pa nyid dang yang //
T02TD1661E:12b-39: slob dpon mang po'i gzhung thos nas //
T02TD1661E:12b-40: bdag gi gzhung 'di zab gyur pa //
T02TD1661E:12b-41: sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin pa po //
T02TD1661E:12b-42: sh'akya blo gros chen po nyon //
T02TD1661E:12b-43: dang po chags las rnam rgyal zhing //
T02TD1661E:12b-44: de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang //
T02TD1661E:12b-45: nga rgyal de bzhin khro ba dang //
T02TD1661E:12b-46: sred dang sdug bsngal bkres skom dang //
T02TD1661E:12b-47: bde ba med cing chags bral ba //
T02TD1661E:12b-48: mdza' bshes dang ni dgrar mnyam pas //
T02TD1661E:12b-49: gal te dngos grub 'dod gyur na //
T02TD1661E:12b-50: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:12b-51: lus gnas bha ga'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1661E:12b-52: dang po stong pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:12b-53: shin tu phra ba'i rlung gi ngos //
T02TD1661E:13a-0: @13a * // phra rab drug tu phye ba yis //
T02TD1661E:13a-1: sgo dgu po ni thams cad dag / rtag tu de yis dbye bar bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-2: steng gi sgor ni nges 'byung bar //
T02TD1661E:13a-3: sngags pas rtag tu bsam par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni //
T02TD1661E:13a-5: bha ga'i dbus gnas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-6: der ni stong nyid dbus gnas par //
T02TD1661E:13a-7: bsgoms nas glu ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-8: stong pa yod med shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
T02TD1661E:13a-9: nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas //
T02TD1661E:13a-10: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD1661E:13a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag aom las dkyil 'khor bya ba ste //
T02TD1661E:13a-12: zur gsum du ni dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02TD1661E:13a-13: yi ge aa las padma te //
T02TD1661E:13a-14: 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas pa bsgom //
T02TD1661E:13a-15: rtag tu stong pa nam mkha' lnga //
T02TD1661E:13a-16: dbu dang thig ler rnam brgyan zhing //
T02TD1661E:13a-17: zla ba'i phyed dang ldan pa ni //
T02TD1661E:13a-18: yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-19: sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni //
T02TD1661E:13a-20: phyogs bcu rnams su spro bar bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-21: rang gi ngo bo'i rigs dbye bas //
T02TD1661E:13a-22: lha ni de ru bskyed par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-23: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa dang //
T02TD1661E:13a-24: brgya 'am yang na stong nyid du //
T02TD1661E:13a-25: sgrub pa po ni ci 'dod par //
T02TD1661E:13a-26: bsam gtan du ni brtag par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-27: sngags pas yang ni rtag stong pa //
T02TD1661E:13a-28: aa yis mnan cing brgyan pa la //
T02TD1661E:13a-29: ra ni stan du dgram bya ba //
T02TD1661E:13a-30: bde mchog sgron ma la sogs pa //
T02TD1661E:13a-31: lha rnams bskyed pa 'di yis ni //
T02TD1661E:13a-32: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-33: rang gi lha yi rim pa yi //
T02TD1661E:13a-34: der ni snying po brjod par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-35: phyag rgya rnams kyis yongs bskor nas //
T02TD1661E:13a-36: sngags pas yongs su rdzogs par bsgom //
T02TD1661E:13a-37: dri chu mtshal ni chen po dang //
T02TD1661E:13a-38: der ni mchod par rab tu bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-39: sha chen sa bon dag dang yang //
T02TD1661E:13a-40: rtag tu mchod pa rim bzhin brtsam //
T02TD1661E:13a-41: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur par //
T02TD1661E:13a-42: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-43: slar yang bdag gis gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD1661E:13a-44: lha yi bzlas brjod dag kyang bya //
T02TD1661E:13a-45: spos dang me tog byug pa dang //
T02TD1661E:13a-46: glu gar nye bar mchod pa dang //
T02TD1661E:13a-47: mchod yon yang dang yang phul nas //
T02TD1661E:13a-48: de 'og lha rnams gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1661E:13a-49: sngags pas lha rnams spyan drangs nas //
T02TD1661E:13b-0: bdag @13b gi snying ni dgang bar bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-1: sngags pa ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
T02TD1661E:13b-2: bdag nyid rnam par sel bas ni //
T02TD1661E:13b-3: stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas su //
T02TD1661E:13b-4: steng gi sgo nas zhugs par bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-5: chos kyi 'khor lo lte ba che //
T02TD1661E:13b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor pa //
T02TD1661E:13b-7: rang gi rigs kyi lha dag ni //
T02TD1661E:13b-8: stong pa'i dbus gnas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-9: dmar chen dang ni ga pur bcas //
T02TD1661E:13b-10: tsandan dmar po bza' bya zhing //
T02TD1661E:13b-11: tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni //
T02TD1661E:13b-12: ras ya na kun slong ba'o //
T02TD1661E:13b-13: gang zhig de yi rigs gyur pa'i //
T02TD1661E:13b-14: bud med thams cad spyad bya ste //
T02TD1661E:13b-15: gsang sngags yi ge gsum gyi lus //
T02TD1661E:13b-16: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-17: bhr'um ni bha ga'i dbus gnas shing //
T02TD1661E:13b-18: h'um las rdo rjer gyur pa ni //
T02TD1661E:13b-19: bsams nas sngags pas la sa rigs bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-20: cho ga yis ni rdzas rnams bza' //
T02TD1661E:13b-21: bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i khro bo ni //
T02TD1661E:13b-22: bdud rtsi thab sbyor las byung ba //
T02TD1661E:13b-23: de dang dmar chen tsandan bcas //
T02TD1661E:13b-24: bdud rtsi dag ni bza' ba ni //
T02TD1661E:13b-25: las rnams thams cad byed par bshad //
T02TD1661E:13b-26: de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa la //
T02TD1661E:13b-27: dang po bdud rtsi thab sbyor zhes //
T02TD1661E:13b-28: grags pa sngags pas brjod par bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-29: de nas skal bzang rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02TD1661E:13b-30: sgrub pa pos ni bltas tsam gyis //
T02TD1661E:13b-31: sa stengs bud med ji rnyed pa //
T02TD1661E:13b-33: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mo //
T02TD1661E:13b-34: rigs ngan sme sha khrus mkhan ma //
T02TD1661E:13b-36: gang du 'dod par spyad par bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-37: bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD1661E:13b-38: phyag rgyar bcas bdag sngags rig pas //
T02TD1661E:13b-39: sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub bya zhing //
T02TD1661E:13b-40: bha gar bdud rtsi bza' bar bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-41: bha ga'i padma reg bya zhing //
T02TD1661E:13b-42: ro 'dzin pa yang bskyod par bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-43: rnyog pa med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02TD1661E:13b-45: de yi dus su rang gi lha'i //
T02TD1661E:13b-46: sbyor ba dag ni mi bya min //
T02TD1661E:13b-47: skye bo med cing dben pa dang //
T02TD1661E:13b-48: gsang zhing bzang ba'i gnas gcig tu //
T02TD1661E:13b-49: rang gi lha yi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1661E:13b-50: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:13b-51: byang chub sems ni rab 'bad pas //
T02TD1661E:13b-52: su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02TD1661E:13b-53: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1661E:14a-0: @14a * // gsangs sngags de yang brjod mi bya //
T02TD1661E:14a-1: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dag /'di ni byang chub yin par bstan //
T02TD1661E:14a-2: ji ltar gzugs ni rnam gnon pa //
T02TD1661E:14a-3: gzhan yang yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD1661E:14a-4: slob dpon la las bshad pa ni //
T02TD1661E:14a-5: rnam snang dpal gyi dkyil 'khor du //

T02TD1661E:14a-7: bsam bzlas cho ga'i rim gyis ni //

T02TD1661E:14a-16: rdo rje nyi ma spyan bya zhing //

T02TD1661E:14a-18: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1661E:14a-19: de bzhin du ni rta mchog go //

T02TD1661E:14a-21: de bzhin mkha' 'gro thams cad spyad //
T02TD1661E:14a-22: 'di la slob dpon gzhung mang ste /

T02TD1661E:14a-24: sngags kyis gzugs dag mnan pa la //

T02TD1661E:14a-27: rigs kyi dbye bas mnan par bya //
T02TD1661E:14a-28: mnan pa sgom pa zhes bshad pas //
T02TD1661E:14a-29: bdag gis thams cad bsgom par bya //
T02TD1661E:14a-30: sngags pa grub par gyur pa ni //

T02TD1661E:14a-32: gzhan yang rab bzhad rdo rje yis //
T02TD1661E:14a-33: gnas 'dir gzhung du gyur pa ni //
T02TD1661E:14a-34: rnam par snang mdzad dpal kyi sgra //
T02TD1661E:14a-35: sa bon nyid ni yin par bshad //

T02TD1661E:14a-37: de tshe rdo rje nyi mar gyur //
T02TD1661E:14a-38: de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
T02TD1661E:14a-39: padma gar dbang ngo bo'ang de //
T02TD1661E:14a-40: skyes pa bud med gzugs rnams ni //

T02TD1661E:14a-42: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02TD1661E:14a-43: de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma kun spyad //
T02TD1661E:14a-44: byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul ba //

T02TD1661E:14b-0: rab bzhad rdo rje'i @14b gzhung yin te //
T02TD1661E:14b-1: slob dpon ku ku ra yis gzhan //

T02TD1661E:14b-6: rdo rje can gyi slar bslangs nas //

T02TD1661E:14b-8: bsgom bya'i gzhung ni 'di lta bu //

T02TD1661E:14b-17: sems ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD1661E:14b-18: lus kyi gzugs su rnam par bshad //
T02TD1661E:14b-19: gnon pa rim bzhin spyad pa'o //
T02TD1661E:14b-20: 'byor pa rgyal po rol mo che //
T02TD1661E:14b-21: bud med kun gyi gsang ba'o //
T02TD1661E:14b-23: 'dod chags rnam par snang mdzad yin //
T02TD1661E:14b-24: zhe sdang rdo rje rigs su bshad //
T02TD1661E:14b-25: gti mug de bzhin padma'i rigs //
T02TD1661E:14b-26: nga rgyal rdo rje nyi ma yin //
T02TD1661E:14b-27: khro bo nyid ni he ru ka //
T02TD1661E:14b-28: sred pa rta mgrin yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:14b-29: gang gzhan bud med longs spyod cing //
T02TD1661E:14b-30: drag po'i sbyor bas longs spyod la //
T02TD1661E:14b-31: sna tshogs phyag rgyas yongs bskor nas //
T02TD1661E:14b-32: gzugs kyi sgra ni mtshan yin te //
T02TD1661E:14b-33: lus nyid kyang ni gzugs yin no //

T02TD1661E:15a-2: / shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang //

T02TD1661E:15a-4: 'di la mi sbyin ci yang med //
T02TD1661E:15a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi don bya ba //
T02TD1661E:15a-6: 'gro ba dang ni byed pa dang //
T02TD1661E:15a-7: dpung rnams thams cad rab 'joms par //
T02TD1661E:15a-8: rdo rje can gyis gang gsungs pa /
T02TD1661E:15a-9: gang zhig bde chen grub gyur pa'i //
T02TD1661E:15a-10: sngags pa yis ni thams cad bya //
T02TD1661E:15a-11: de la ngan 'gro yod min te //
T02TD1661E:15a-12: rtag tu sgrub pa por 'gyur ro //
T02TD1661E:15a-13: gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir //
T02TD1661E:15a-14: khro bo'i rgyal por de sprul cing //
T02TD1661E:15a-15: rdo rje padma'i sbyor chen gyis //
T02TD1661E:15a-16: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1661E:15a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba la //
T02TD1661E:15a-18: sngags pa gang zhig mngon slob pa //
T02TD1661E:15a-19: sems kun las ni legs byung pa //
T02TD1661E:15a-20: sangs rgyas chags pa rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:15a-21: gang tshe sngar ni des bshad pa //
T02TD1661E:15a-22: brtan pa dang ni g-yo ba dag / rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems //
T02TD1661E:15a-23: gzugs brnyan la ni bsgom pa ste //
T02TD1661E:15a-25: bris par gang dag gyur pa la'o //
T02TD1661E:15a-26: yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1661E:15a-27: byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1661E:15a-28: rang nyid kyi ni nang dag na //
T02TD1661E:15a-29: gang zhig stong par rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1661E:15a-30: byang chub sems ni stong pa ste //
T02TD1661E:15a-31: rdo rje rnam snang rang nyid do //
T02TD1661E:15a-32: de nyid chags dang chags bral dang //
T02TD1661E:15a-33: srid dang grol bar gyur pa yin //
T02TD1661E:15a-34: brtan dang g-yo ba sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1661E:15a-36: gtan tshigs des na bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1661E:15a-37: sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du shar //
T02TD1661E:15a-38: rang gi che ba lha yi sgras //
T02TD1661E:15a-39: rang gi stong pa'i rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:15a-40: bde ba'i mchog la tshig 'di nyid //

T02TD1661E:15a-43: mi yi 'jig rten dag tu sgrogs //
T02TD1661E:15a-44: ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid //
T02TD1661E:15a-45: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas //
T02TD1661E:15a-46: don mthong stobs kyis phrogs nas ni //
T02TD1661E:15a-47: de ni dad la sbyin par byed //
T02TD1661E:15a-48: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang //

T02TD1661E:15a-51: dngos grub dang ni ji zhig smos //

T02TD1661E:16a-19: sna tshogs mchod pa du ma ste //
T02TD1661E:16a-20: ras la padma bri bar bya //
T02TD1661E:16a-21: bla bre bsgrengs nas bri bya zhing //
T02TD1661E:16a-22: bsgrub pa'i stan ni 'dzom par byed //
T02TD1661E:16a-23: lha mo rnams kyi rang gi mtshan //
T02TD1661E:16a-24: gos dang rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD1661E:16a-25: bzhag nas rig pa mchod bya'i phyir //
T02TD1661E:16a-26: yang dang yang du spyad par bya //
T02TD1661E:16a-27: phyi nas mnyam med mi g-yo ba'i //
T02TD1661E:16a-28: bstod pa dbyangs su gdon par bya //
T02TD1661E:16a-29: sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:16a-30: sna tshogs ras kyis bkab pa yi //
T02TD1661E:16a-31: thams cad dag pa'i stan de ni //
T02TD1661E:16a-32: rang gi gzhung ni gang yin pa //
T02TD1661E:16a-33: rab tu brtse bas bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:16a-34: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:16a-35: sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1661E:16a-36: padma'i sgra ni bde mchog yin //
T02TD1661E:16a-37: ras kyi sgra ni pags par bshad //
T02TD1661E:16a-38: thas cad dag pa sa bon yin//
T02TD1661E:16a-39: stan ni bha ga zhes bshad de //
T02TD1661E:16a-40: gang du rnal 'byor pas rol pa //
T02TD1661E:16a-41: rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te /
T02TD1661E:16a-42: aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung nyon cig / sna tshogs du ma zhes bshad de //
T02TD1661E:16a-43: bstod pa mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD1661E:16a-44: padma gnas su gyur pa yin //
T02TD1661E:16a-45: ras ni de yi pags pa yin /
T02TD1661E:16a-46: bkab pa sgrub pa yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:16a-47: bha ga thams cad dag pa'i stan //
T02TD1661E:16a-48: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha //
T02TD1661E:16a-49: de nyid du ni rnam par rol //
T02TD1661E:16a-50: sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1661E:16a-51: gcig pu bsdus pa'i bya ba mdzad //
T02TD1661E:16a-52: nang gi gzhung ni 'di yin te //
T02TD1661E:16b-1: aindra bh'u ti'i bshad gzhung gis //
T02TD1661E:16b-2: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba yin //
T02TD1661E:16b-3: tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi pa //
T02TD1661E:16b-4: rnal 'byor ma dang bla ma mchod //
T02TD1661E:16b-5: dmar chen tsandan bcas pa yi //
T02TD1661E:16b-6: rdzas ni 'di yis bza' bar byas //
T02TD1661E:16b-7: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:16b-8: gal te cung zad sgrub 'dod na //
T02TD1661E:16b-9: gang zhig bya ba dang bral bas //
T02TD1661E:16b-10: sgrub pa 'ga' zhig brtsam par bya //
T02TD1661E:16b-11: sbyin sreg las ni mi bya zhing //
T02TD1661E:16b-12: bzlas brjod ma yin gzung ma yin //
T02TD1661E:16b-13: snyung ba brtul zhugs mchod med par //
T02TD1661E:16b-14: de yis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:16b-15: sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:16b-16: bcom ldan phyag mtshan bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:16b-17: de bzhin 'dod chags che las byung //
T02TD1661E:16b-18: de bzhin lha mo'i sngags rnams dang //
T02TD1661E:16b-19: chos gos dang ni lhung bzed nyid //
T02TD1661E:16b-20: rnal 'byor rgyud las bshad pa yi ;
T02TD1661E:16b-21: / de bzhin glegs bam mkhar gsil gsung //
T02TD1661E:16b-22: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ce gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:16b-23: 'dod chags chen po las byung ba //
T02TD1661E:16b-24: gzhon nu bdag po dang 'dus khrag / tsandan dang ni sha chen te //
T02TD1661E:16b-25: gci ba rdo rje chu zhes bya //
T02TD1661E:16b-26: rdo rje bcas pa'i dri bshad pa'o//
T02TD1661E:16b-27: padma'i snod ni k'a pa la //
T02TD1661E:16b-28: sgrub pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1661E:16b-29: rdzas de der ni brtag par bya //
T02TD1661E:16b-30: bde mchog sa bon ham zhes bya //
T02TD1661E:16b-31: brda yi tshig gis chos gos yin //
T02TD1661E:16b-32: kye ma'o bde ba zhes bya ba'i //
T02TD1661E:16b-33: dza yis bon lhung bzed yin //
T02TD1661E:16b-34: sgron ma'i yi ge ba yang yin //
T02TD1661E:16b-35: brda yi tshig gis mkhar gsil yin //
T02TD1661E:16b-36: sha shi'i yi ge ha yang yin //
T02TD1661E:16b-37: sa bon lnga dang ldan gyur pa //
T02TD1661E:16b-38: sangs rgyas ming gis sbas pa ste /
T02TD1661E:16b-39: de nyid ming ni glegs bam mo //
T02TD1661E:16b-40: padma gar dbang phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1661E:16b-41: padmar ldan pa'i yi ge h'um //
T02TD1661E:16b-42: h'um bhyo h'um zhes btus pa'i sngags //
T02TD1661E:16b-43: sngags ni he ru ka byung ba'o //
T02TD1661E:16b-44: phyag rgya rnams ni dril bu nyid //
T02TD1661E:16b-45: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bshad //
T02TD1661E:16b-46: mam tr'am ba'i bi dzam dzam bam bam /
T02TD1661E:16b-47: rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo rnams //
T02TD1661E:16b-48: aom aom nyid de stong pa ste /
T02TD1661E:16b-49: bam bam dam dam de bzhin te //
T02TD1661E:16b-50: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1661E:17a-2: gzhan gyi 'gros ni rol pa ste //
T02TD1661E:17a-3: yi ge au ni ring rab 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:17a-4: gang gzhan drag po'i sbyor ba ni //
T02TD1661E:17a-5: rta mchog gi ste mtha' yas pa'o //
T02TD1661E:17a-6: sna tshogs padmar de bshad pa //
T02TD1661E:17a-7: bde mchog kye ma bde ba dang //
T02TD1661E:17a-8: sna tshogs padma 'ang sha shi ste //
T02TD1661E:17a-9: sgrol ma de ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1661E:17a-10: lha mo rnams kyi sngags bshad pa //
T02TD1661E:17a-11: sa bon lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1661E:17a-12: stong pa drug par yang dag sbyar //
T02TD1661E:17a-13: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rim pa nyon //
T02TD1661E:17a-14: sngar ni bshad pa byas pa'i tshig / gnas ni shes rab bha ga ste //
T02TD1661E:17a-16: lte ba la ni bde chen po //
T02TD1661E:17a-17: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi kun du yang //
T02TD1661E:17a-18: de yi rnam par bri bar bya //
T02TD1661E:17a-20: lte ba la ni lhar bcas pa //
T02TD1661E:17a-21: sna tshogs gzugs can phyag bzhi pa'i //
T02TD1661E:17a-22: phyag rgya 'dab ma rnams la bri //
T02TD1661E:17a-23: dgu pa la ni sgra 'dzin pas //
T02TD1661E:17a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bri //
T02TD1661E:17a-25: ngos la me tog bdug pa spos //
T02TD1661E:17a-26: lcags kyu la sogs sgo srung bri //
T02TD1661E:17a-27: rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te /
T02TD1661E:17a-28: aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung yang yin //
T02TD1661E:17a-30: bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bya ba yin //
T02TD1661E:17a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' he ru kar //
T02TD1661E:17a-32: gang zhig dbang ni bskur gyur pa //
T02TD1661E:17a-33: de dang rnam par snang mdzad zhal //
T02TD1661E:17a-34: de yi dbus su rang gi lha //
T02TD1661E:17a-35: cho ga 'dis ni mchod bya zhing //
T02TD1661E:17a-36: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya //
T02TD1661E:17a-37: sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:17a-38: bcom ldan sgra ni gang du bsdu //
T02TD1661E:17a-39: de bzhin der ni bcom ldan gang ;
T02TD1661E:17a-40: / de bzhin rgyud kyi sgra dag dang //
T02TD1661E:17a-41: rtog pa'i sgra yang bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:17a-42: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:17a-43: de la bha ni bha ga ste //
T02TD1661E:17a-44: ga ni nam mkha' yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:17a-45: b'ana ni stong pa nyid rdo rje //
T02TD1661E:17a-46: der ni sgra de lus de ste //
T02TD1661E:17a-47: der ni rtsa yis thig btab po //
T02TD1661E:17a-48: ta ni byang chub sems yin la //
T02TD1661E:17a-49: tri ni rnam pa gsum pa ste //
T02TD1661E:17a-50: sku dang gsung dang dang thugs rnams ni //
T02TD1661E:17a-51: gsang bar bcas pas rtag tu brtag / rtog pa zhes bshad khang pa ste //
T02TD1661E:17a-52: dkyil 'khor bya bar gsungs pas na //
T02TD1661E:17a-53: rtog pa'i sgra ni de bshad de //
T02TD1661E:17b-0: ngan par spyod pa'ang mnyan @17b par gyis //
T02TD1661E:17b-1: ngan par spyod pa smad 'tshong ma //
T02TD1661E:17b-2: gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na //
T02TD1661E:17b-3: dga' ston dang ni bde rnyed par //
T02TD1661E:17b-4: rang gi rdo rje can dang ldan //
T02TD1661E:17b-5: 'ang gi sgra ni nges pa ste //
T02TD1661E:17b-7: bha ga'i nang gi rtsa sbubs gnyis //
T02TD1661E:17b-8: ngan par spyod pa yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:17b-9: gzhon nu'i mtshal chen sa bon dag / legs par rnyed pa nyid dga' bstan //
T02TD1661E:17b-10: las kyi rigs ni bsgoms nas su //
T02TD1661E:17b-11: bud med thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1661E:17b-12: slob dpon gnyis pa'i gzhung 'di yin //
T02TD1661E:17b-13: slob dpon rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung //
T02TD1661E:17b-14: aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni //
T02TD1661E:17b-15: ji ltar ngan spyod 'grub par bshad //
T02TD1661E:17b-16: ngan par spyod pa rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:17b-17: gzhir gyur sa bon ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1661E:17b-18: bde mchog rtag tu spyod pa ste //
T02TD1661E:17b-19: bha ga nang gi ling gar ro//
T02TD1661E:17b-20: 'ang gi sgra ni nges par te //
T02TD1661E:17b-21: bde ba chen po de 'thob pa'o //
T02TD1661E:17b-22: rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung bshad nas //
T02TD1661E:17b-23: aindra bh'u ta'i gzhung nyon cig / gug skyed gnyis dang rnam bral ba //
T02TD1661E:17b-24: ngan par spyod pa rnam par bshad //
T02TD1661E:17b-25: de ni thams cad sgyu ma nyid //
T02TD1661E:17b-26: bud med gzugs su 'ang de gnas pa //
T02TD1661E:17b-27: ngan par spyod pa zhes bshad de //
T02TD1661E:17b-28: stong pa rdo rje mkha' la gnas //
T02TD1661E:17b-29: rnyed pa kun dang bde spyod pas //
T02TD1661E:17b-31: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:17b-32: zhi ba la ni smos ci dgos //
T02TD1661E:17b-33: slob dpon gzhan dag 'chad pa ni //
T02TD1661E:17b-34: yi ge gnyis ni sgom byed te //
T02TD1661E:17b-35: ham ni rdo rje can du bshad //
T02TD1661E:17b-36: aa ni bud med 'di yin te //
T02TD1661E:17b-37: yi ge gnyis kyi ming dag ni //
T02TD1661E:17b-38: ngan par spyod pa rnam par bshad //
T02TD1661E:17b-39: rnyed dang bde ba thams cad kyis //
T02TD1661E:17b-42: rdo rje sems dpas rab du gsungs //
T02TD1661E:17b-43: phyag rgya'i nyid dag gis ni //
T02TD1661E:17b-44: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma bshad //
T02TD1661E:17b-45: sku ni yongs su ma bsgyur bas //
T02TD1661E:17b-46: bde mchog rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1661E:17b-47: bsgoms dang bsam gtan 'dzin pa yi //
T02TD1661E:17b-48: de la 'dod chags yod ma yin //
T02TD1661E:17b-49: de bzhin chags dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1661E:17b-50: dbu ma'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1661E:17b-51: phra ba'i gzugs can mkha' la gnas //
T02TD1661E:17b-52: lha mo de ni dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:18a-2: brtan dang g-yo ba rnams la gnas //
T02TD1661E:18a-3: rang gi gzugs ni yongs gyur pas //
T02TD1661E:18a-4: bud med kun gyi sgyu mar bshad //
T02TD1661E:18a-5: khams rnams dang ni lus nyid ni //
T02TD1661E:18a-6: lha mo bde mchog yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:18a-7: sna tshogs du mar bshad pa ste //
T02TD1661E:18a-8: sangs rgyas rol mo rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:18a-9: chos rnams rnam par mi rtog cing //
T02TD1661E:18a-10: stong nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba las //
T02TD1661E:18a-11: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1661E:18a-12: yongs su rtog pa gsungs pa yin //
T02TD1661E:18a-13: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
T02TD1661E:18a-14: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1661E:18a-15: stong nyid gsum bshad bde mchog gi //
T02TD1661E:18a-16: sgra brnyan lta bu'i tshig tu thos //
T02TD1661E:18a-17: dngos med mtshan ma med pa na //
T02TD1661E:18a-18: phyi dang nang du bcas na gnas //
T02TD1661E:18a-19: snying ga'i mkha' dang phyi rol nas //
T02TD1661E:18a-20: de bzhin 'char dang nub pa ru //
T02TD1661E:18a-21: rtag tu rdo rje can rol kyang //
T02TD1661E:18a-22: rang gi sku ni snang mi 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:18a-23: stong nyid gcig pu'ang ma yin te //
T02TD1661E:18a-24: de bzhin sprul pa'i skur mdzad do //
T02TD1661E:18a-25: stong nyid min pa'ang ma yin sgra //
T02TD1661E:18a-26: chos kyi sku ni yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:18a-27: dbu ma ming med ces grags te //
T02TD1661E:18a-28: lte ba'i dbus na rnam par gnas //
T02TD1661E:18a-29: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i ming //
T02TD1661E:18a-30: bde mchog rdo rje can du bshad//
T02TD1661E:18a-31: rnal 'byor sgra ni mnyam sbyor ba / au ni stong pa nyid yin pas //
T02TD1661E:18a-32: rnal 'byor stong nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:18a-33: au nyid kyang ni bde mchog go //
T02TD1661E:18a-34: cha dang thig ler rnam brgyan na //
T02TD1661E:18a-35: thabs ni thams cad byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1661E:18a-36: sangs rgyas kyis 'dus thams cad la //
T02TD1661E:18a-37: sems can kun don bla med pa //
T02TD1661E:18a-38: cha med rtag tu rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:18a-39: cha de yod pa ma yin pa //
T02TD1661E:18a-40: rlung gi gzugs su gnyid log pa //
T02TD1661E:18a-41: de las sprul par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1661E:18a-42: sa bon khams rnams 'dzin byed cing //
T02TD1661E:18a-43: khams rnams thams cad nyid kyang ngo //
T02TD1661E:18a-44: de bas chos kyi skur 'gyur ba //
T02TD1661E:18a-45: gang tshe stong nyid thig ler bcas //
T02TD1661E:18a-46: gang tshe de yi gug skyed dang //
T02TD1661E:18a-47: chad dang zla phyed byung gyur pa //
T02TD1661E:18a-48: de tshe 'dir ni sku yi sgrar //
T02TD1661E:18a-49: longs spyod rdzogs pa chen por bshad //
T02TD1661E:18a-50: lte ba'i dbus na padma che //
T02TD1661E:18a-51: bcu drug thig gis thig btab pa //
T02TD1661E:18a-52: de dbus rtag tu stong pa yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-0: g-yas pa mchog la @18b zhugs pa yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-1: dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1661E:18b-2: thams cad bskyed par mdzad pa yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-3: chos kyi sku ni byung gyur nas //
T02TD1661E:18b-4: de 'og mi rnams byung ba yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-5: rtag tu gzugs med rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:18b-6: rtag tu sbrum ma'i bu bzhin no //
T02TD1661E:18b-7: sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:18b-8: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang //
T02TD1661E:18b-9: de bzhin spyi bor nor bu 'ching //
T02TD1661E:18b-10: rtag du'i sgra ni ji lta bu //
T02TD1661E:18b-11: bcom ldan bla mas bshad du gsol //
T02TD1661E:18b-12: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:18b-13: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni //
T02TD1661E:18b-14: he ru ka yi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1661E:18b-15: slob dpon mang pos rab tu bshad rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te //
T02TD1661E:18b-16: thod pa lus zhes bya ba yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-17: phreng ba rked pa'i ming yin la //
T02TD1661E:18b-18: cod pan bhag yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:18b-19: sangs rgyas sa bon yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:18b-20: nor bu bde ba zhes bshad de //
T02TD1661E:18b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i sa bon dag / rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te//
T02TD1661E:18b-22: aindra bh'u ta'i gzhung nyon cig / thod pa g-yogs pa yin par bshad //
T02TD1661E:18b-23: phreng ba sngags ni stong pa'o //
T02TD1661E:18b-24: dbu rgyan lte ba'i kha yin te //
T02TD1661E:18b-25: bcu drug thig gis thig btab pa'o //
T02TD1661E:18b-26: sangs rgyas sgra ru bshad pa der //
T02TD1661E:18b-27: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams //
T02TD1661E:18b-28: de rnams dbus gyur stong pa nyid //
T02TD1661E:18b-29: de nyid gtsug gi nor bur bshad //
T02TD1661E:18b-30: gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1661E:18b-31: rtag par sngon ni gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1661E:18b-32: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang //
T02TD1661E:18b-33: de bzhin sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor //
T02TD1661E:18b-35: sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i brda yin te //
T02TD1661E:18b-36: dpal ni lha mo'i stong nyid de //
T02TD1661E:18b-37: lte ba'i kha yi padma yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-38: nags kyi gnas zhes bstan pa ni //
T02TD1661E:18b-39: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams //
T02TD1661E:18b-40: 'di zhes bya bar rjes dpag par //
T02TD1661E:18b-41: brda yi sgras ni bstan pa yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-42: sangs rgyas sgra ni stong nyid de //
T02TD1661E:18b-43: phyag rgya bde mchog bha ga yin //
T02TD1661E:18b-44: rdo rje sems dpa' rtag sangs rgyas //
T02TD1661E:18b-45: he ru ka dang rta mchog dang /
T02TD1661E:18b-46: rdo rje nyi ma'i 'jig rten dbang //
T02TD1661E:18b-47: sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten du //
T02TD1661E:18b-48: de dag gzugs rnams thams cad mdzad //
T02TD1661E:18b-49: stong pa'i thig le rnam sbangs pa //
T02TD1661E:18b-50: ji ltar khang ba'i zur bzhi ni //
T02TD1661E:19a-1: 'di ni stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1661E:19a-2: cha yi rnyog dang rnam bral zhing //
T02TD1661E:19a-3: stong ba'i thig le yongs spangs pa //
T02TD1661E:19a-4: sems med par ni yang dag bstan //
T02TD1661E:19a-5: rnal 'byor pa yi gnas mchog go //
T02TD1661E:19a-6: skye gnas sa bon rim khyab pa ;
T02TD1661E:19a-7: gzhi dang khang pa nyid dang ni //
T02TD1661E:19a-8: las dang sbyor ba rang nus pa //
T02TD1661E:19a-9: rang gi ngo bor yi ger sbyar //
T02TD1661E:19a-10: tshig gi don ni bcu gnyis po //
T02TD1661E:19a-11: sngags kyi snying por gyur pa'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-12: de dag thams cad rig pa ni //
T02TD1661E:19a-13: sngags kyi de nyid mtshon pa ste //
T02TD1661E:19a-14: yid la gang dag 'dod pa yi //
T02TD1661E:19a-15: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1661E:19a-16: de la rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rtse lnga pa'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-17: rdo rje ba tv'am ga zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1661E:19a-18: rdo rje kha tv'am gnyid do //
T02TD1661E:19a-19: rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba ni dri la bu nyid do //
T02TD1661E:19a-20: k'a la ka zhes bya ba ni da ma ru'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-21: gos chen po zhes bya ba ni mi'i pags pa'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-22: dbang bskur ba chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-23: sha chen po zhes bya ba ni sha chen po nyid do //
T02TD1661E:19a-24: chang chen po zhes bya ba ni dmar chen po'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-25: mchod phyir thogs zhes bya ba ni mi'i go'i phreng ba'o / stong pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-26: sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sa bon no //
T02TD1661E:19a-27: sa bon zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-28: rab tu bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gzhung ni //
T02TD1661E:19a-29: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-30: de la aom zhes bya ba ni sa'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-31: a'a: zhes bya ba ni chu'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-32: h'um zhes bya ba ni me'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-33: sv'a zhes bya ba ni rlung ngo //
T02TD1661E:19a-34: h'a zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-35: h'am zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'o //
T02TD1661E:19a-36: de yang dang po'i aom ni sa'i ngo bo ste //
T02TD1661E:19a-37: mig gis nam mkhar gnas nas gzugs rnams mthong //
T02TD1661E:19a-38: rdo rje h'um ni snying gar rnam bsam pa //
T02TD1661E:19a-39: rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam shes ming gis gsungs //
T02TD1661E:19a-40: a'a: ni gsungs ste 'jig rten dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1661E:19a-41: rna bar gnas sv'a rdo rje nyi ma yin //
T02TD1661E:19a-42: sna yi h'a ni he ru ka ru bshad //
T02TD1661E:19a-43: rta mchog ming ni stong pa'i rdo rje can //
T02TD1661E:19a-45: sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1661E:19a-46: ae ma'o 'gro ba 'a thon byed bde ba che //
T02TD1661E:19a-47: ae ma'o sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1661E:19b-0: ae ma'o @19b nges sbas sangs rgyas thams cad mchog / ae ma'o rnyed dka' aindra bh'u mi'i bla //
T02TD1661E:19b-1: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1661E:19b-2: sh'akyas gang dris aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gi dka' 'grel bshad //
T02TD1661E:19b-3: slob dpon chen po mang pos bshad gzhung ming gis legs bshad pas//
T02TD1661E:19b-4: bdag gis bsod nams nges par gang bsags des ni 'gro ba kun //
T02TD1661E:19b-5: myur du sangs rgyas kun skyes dngos grub che mchog snang thob shog / dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon aindra bh'u ti'i mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1661E:19b-8: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'a rya shraddha ka ra barma dang /
T02TD1661E:19b-9: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos zhing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//
